snippet: Reversing a decades-old rule, a federal appeals court said Thursday that public television and radio stations cannot be prohibited from broadcasting paid political advertisements.
abstract: Reversing a decades-old rule, a federal appeals court said Thursday that public television and radio stations cannot be prohibited from broadcasting paid political advertisements.

headline.main: Ruling Clears Way for Political Ads on Public Stations
headline.print_headline: Court Says Public Stations Can Broadcast Political Ads
